When taken appropriately, they help to provide amino peptides, minerals, and vitamin combinations to replenish brain stores of essential neurotransmitters, which in turn allow you to feel better. Additionally, these micronutrients can allow allow medications to work more effectively.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lifestyle Coaching","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Just like nutrition is a big part of wellness, so too is an active lifestyle and rich social network. Life style coaching can get you a jump start on achieving a work-life balance, improve family relationships, get you motivated for new adventures, and help you transition smoothly between various phases of life.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Hormone Balancing","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Bioidentical hormone replacement therapy (BHRT) is the key to vitality and longevity. Many times, replacing Hormone levels to their optimum, whether it is cortisol, thyroid or testosterone, can lead to a significant improvement in energy, mood, attention, sleep, and libido.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We offer comprehensive testing for hormone levels and other biochemistry as needed. We also offer a metabolic consultation where the doctor goes over your test results and lays out your personalized diet and supplement program.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
